rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious north-facing entrance hall with modern finishes and minimalistic design. Serves as a transitional space from the exterior to interior spaces.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Contemporary living room area designed for relaxation and social interactions with ample natural light. It includes built-in entertainment units and open space planning.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining space adjacent to the living room, facilitating conversation during meals, with a modern dining table set-up.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen equipped with state-of-the-art appliances and an open-plan layout that connects to the living area. Vastu principles ensure that cooking area is in a favorable direction.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Well-appointed guest bedroom with ample storage and comfortable furnishings, maintaining privacy from main family areas.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master suite featuring an en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet and a private balcony ensuring relaxation and Vastu alignment for health.

rooms.name: ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern ensuite bathroom designed for the master bedroom with contemporary fixtures and ambient lighting.

rooms.name: Servant Quarters
rooms.description: Dedicated area for domestic help, comprising a compact bedroom, small kitchenette and bathroom following local building norms and privacy considerations.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: North-facing entrance with an inviting pathway, large glass door for natural light, ensuring smooth transition from exterior to interior spaces.

openings.name: Guest Entrance
openings.description: Secondary entrance in the south-east corner for guests and service use, designed with Vastu alignment to avoid direct east-west conflicts.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Access point for the master bedroom balcony leading to an outdoor space designed for relaxation and Vastu balance.

openings.name: Window Atrium
openings.description: Large windows in the living room and kitchen area to maximize natural light and ensure balanced energy flow as per Vastu principles.

openings.name: Service Window
openings.description: Window in the servant quarters designed for ventilation and light while ensuring privacy. Aligned with Vastu guidelines.
